name: Monty Ritchings
what_you_do: Monty Ritchings is an author who writes about mind management, core beliefs, and working beyond the mundane world.
who_you_serve: People who want to learn how to create beliefs, how they become embedded in memory, and how to reframe them using visualization and other simple-to-use tools.
social_proof: Monty Ritchings has written 4 non-fiction books and 1 fiction book.
signature_programs: Books: Embracing The Blend, Stamp Out Stress, Charkas Demystified, Healthy Children Only Need Three Things, The Ascenders Return To Grace.
business_focus: Monty Ritchings focuses on mind management, core beliefs, and working beyond the mundane world.
